languages.text: "И бьют они так ловко, словно наперед знают, что и как произойдет. В штабе семь офицеров расстреляли по подозрению в шпионаже, да только не в лазутчиках дело. Говорят, за главного у мятежников какая-то двуликая Заря, которая умеет будущее читать. Вот в ней-то главная опасность для нас".

"And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."
languages.original_text: "И бьют они так ловко, словно наперед знают, что и как произойдет. В штабе семь офицеров расстреляли по подозрению в шпионаже, да только не в лазутчиках дело. Говорят, за главного у мятежников какая-то двуликая Заря, которая умеет будущее читать. Вот в ней-то главная опасность для нас".

traits.locale_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. She is the real danger."

They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

"And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

languages.text: "Und ihre Angriffe sind so präzise, als wüssten sie schon im Voraus, was passieren wird. Die Befehlshaber haben sieben Offiziere wegen Spionageverdachts hingerichtet, aber es ist keine Spionage. Sie sagen, der Anführer der Rebellen sei eine gewisse 'doppelzüngige' Aurora, die in die Zukunft sehen kann. Sie ist die wahre Gefahr."
languages.original_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

traits.locale_text: "Und ihre Angriffe sind so präzise, als wüssten sie schon im Voraus, was passieren wird. Die Befehlshaber haben sieben Offiziere wegen Spionageverdachts hingerichtet, aber es ist keine Spionage. Sie sagen, der Anführer der Rebellen sei eine gewisse 'doppelzüngige' Aurora, die in die Zukunft sehen kann. Sie ist die wahre Gefahr."

languages.text: « Et leurs attaques sont d'une précision redoutable, c'est comme s'ils savaient à l'avance ce qui allait se passer. Le haut-commandement a exécuté sept officiers soupçonnés d'espionnage, mais là n'est pas le problème... Il paraît que les rebelles sont dirigés par une certaine "Aurore aux deux visages" qui serait capable de prédire l'avenir. C'est elle, la véritable menace. »
languages.original_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

traits.locale_text: « Et leurs attaques sont d'une précision redoutable, c'est comme s'ils savaient à l'avance ce qui allait se passer. Le haut-commandement a exécuté sept officiers soupçonnés d'espionnage, mais là n'est pas le problème... Il paraît que les rebelles sont dirigés par une certaine "Aurore aux deux visages" qui serait capable de prédire l'avenir. C'est elle, la véritable menace. »

languages.text: “他们的攻击过于精确，就好像他们提前知道会发生什么事情一样。指挥部已经处决了七名涉嫌通敌的军官，但这种事情和通敌什么的根本没有关系。他们说，叛军的领袖是个叫‘极光’的两面派，说她可以预知未来。她才是真正的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

traits.locale_text: “他们的攻击过于精确，就好像他们提前知道会发生什么事情一样。指挥部已经处决了七名涉嫌通敌的军官，但这种事情和通敌什么的根本没有关系。他们说，叛军的领袖是个叫‘极光’的两面派，说她可以预知未来。她才是真正的威胁。”

languages.text: 「それに、奴らの攻撃は正確そのもので、前もって何が起こるのかわかってるようなんです。司令部はスパイ容疑で7人の士官を処刑しましたが、これはスパイ活動の問題ではありません。暴徒のリーダーは『ふたつの顔を持つ』オーロラだそうです。そいつは未来が見えるとか。今では奴が真の脅威です」
languages.original_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、奴らの攻撃は正確そのもので、前もって何が起こるのかわかってるようなんです。スパイ容疑で7名の役人に処刑命令が出ましたが、あれは諜報活動の範疇じゃありません。暴徒のリーダーは『ふたつの顔を持つ』オーロラだそうです。そいつは未来が見えるとか。今では奴が真の脅威です」

languages.text: «Y sus ataques, son tan precisos, es como si supieran lo que va a pasar de antemano. El mando ejecutó a siete oficiales sospechosos de espionaje, pero no se trata de espionaje. Dicen que el líder de los rebeldes es una tal Aurora "con dos caras" que puede ver el futuro. Ella es el verdadero peligro».
languages.original_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

traits.locale_text: «Y sus ataques, son tan precisos, es como si supieran lo que va a pasar de antemano. El mando ejecutó a siete oficiales sospechosos de espionaje, pero no se trata de espionaje. Dicen que el líder de los rebeldes es una tal Aurora "con dos caras" que puede ver el futuro. Ella es el verdadero peligro».

languages.text: "Ayrıca saldırıları o kadar isabetli ki sanki ne olacağını önceden biliyorlar. Komuta, casusluk şüphesiyle yedi subayı infaz etti ama olay casuslukta değil. İsyancıların liderinin, geleceği görebilen 'iki suratlı' dedikleri Aurora adında biri olduğunu söylüyorlar. İşte asıl tehlike o."
languages.original_text: "And their attacks, they're so precise, it's like they know what's going to happen ahead of time. The command executed seven officers on suspicion of espionage, but it's not about spying. They say the leader of the rebels is some 'two-faced' Aurora who can see into the future. Now, she is the real danger."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca saldırıları o kadar isabetli ki sanki ne olacağını önceden biliyorlar. Komuta, casusluk şüphesiyle yedi subayı infaz etti ama olay casuslukta değil. İsyancıların liderinin, geleceği görebilen 'iki suratlı' dedikleri Aurora adında biri olduğunu söylüyorlar. İşte asıl tehlike o."
